casebody.data:
MAURA ALEXANDER ET AL. v. RETIREMENT BOARD OF THE CITY OF WATERBURY Elena Ricci Palermo, corporation counsel, in support of the petition. Henry F. Murray and Daniel E. Livingston, in opposition. Decided July 6, 2000

SULLIVAN and VERTEFEUILLE, Js., did not participate in the consideration or decision of this petition.

No opinion found.Click here to view source material.
